snippet: Simon Hobday, the fun-loving South African golfer who won the 1994 U.S. Senior Open at Pinehurst, died Thursday after a fight with cancer. He was 76....

headline.main: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76
headline.print_headline: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76

lead_paragraph: Simon Hobday, the fun-loving South African golfer who won the 1994 U.S. Senior Open at Pinehurst, died Thursday after a fight with cancer. He was 76.
